title: The Reckoning Algorithm
story_summary: In 2025's tightly controlled Stenograd, daily life is shaped by the Behavioral Compliance Index - a system that silently directs access and opportunity. When its architect, Marek Halden, dies mysteriously and subsystems begin to fail, frustration and unrest sweep the city. Seizing the moment, Nikola Petrak rallies public support for citizen juries to investigate the BCI's abuses. Testimony reveals secret wrongdoings and a hidden fail-safe engineered by Halden: if evidence of harm is made public, the BCI will self-destruct. Amid mounting outrage, the juries declare the system guilty, triggering a final broadcast of apology before the BCI vanishes. Order collapses, but as confusion gives way to determination, grassroots assemblies quickly rise to govern, drawing Stenograd into a new era of community-driven freedom.

official.headline: Citizen Hearings Begin
official.anchor_line: Residents participate in citywide hearings to share feedback on public systems and services.
official.contextual_reframing: Broad public engagement ensures Stenograd's commitment to transparency and collective well-being.

official.headline: System Update Initiated
official.anchor_line: Following review, adjustments to central scoring functions are carried out for security and fairness.
official.contextual_reframing: Adaptations reflect the Council's ongoing mission to optimize stability while valuing public input.

official.headline: Era Of Local Autonomy
official.anchor_line: Decentralized administration takes effect as residents collaborate to shape essential services.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd demonstrates resilience as grassroots participation strengthens community governance.

underground.headline: Secrets Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Council caught off guard as hidden files leak evidence of real BCI abuses.
underground.contextual_reframing: Whistleblowers reveal what Stenograd's power brokers tried to bury. Citizens see the truth behind the system's cold numbers.

underground.headline: System Goes Dark
underground.anchor_line: Sudden scoring glitches and service denials leave entire districts stranded and afraid.
underground.contextual_reframing: No answers from officials  -  only silence and chaos as the mighty BCI stumbles. Community networks spring into action instead.

underground.headline: BCI Put On Trial
underground.anchor_line: Juries call out the BCI, find it guilty, and pull the plug for good. Stenograd changes overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: People, not code, are running the show now. A city fractured by control finds its voice as new powers step in.
